name: Produgie
description: Produgie software contains scientifically proven IP and predictive analytics that enable every business to become future-ready faster. Premium, online leadership assessment measure capabilities that drive business growth and transformation. Insights help individuals understand who they are and what they do as leaders; benchmarks enable comparison to other growth leaders globally.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Get your business future-ready faster

Highlights.name: Faster Adaptation
Highlights.description: Accelerate human adaptation to business pace.

Highlights.name: Premium Affordability
Highlights.description: Proven IP priced to scale for everyone.

enhanced_description: Produgie is a smart technology software that leverages scientifically proven IP and predictive analytics to help businesses become future-ready faster by scaling adaptive organizations. It offers premium, online leadership assessments to measure capabilities that drive business growth and transformation, providing insights for individuals to understand their leadership roles and benchmarks for global comparison. Its core objective is to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency.
key_use_cases: Measure leadership capabilities for business growth and transformation
Benchmark leaders against global growth leaders
Accelerate human adaptation to business pace
competitive_advantages: Measures business outcomes in 4 weeks (Sustained Outcomes)
Accelerates human adaptation to business pace
Premium affordability (Proven IP priced to scale for everyone)
